text: [Music]
hi I'm Sonia and welcome to today's

used to love fruits always but now I

have guessed we're going to do a lesson

idiom we have here is a plum job okay
now what's a plum a plum is basically a
small red juicy and very sweet fruit
okay so a plum job means a very good job
and when I say job actually mean walk
okay something that you do for a living
so if I want to say that someone has got
a really good job in a company in a
sentence I could use it by saying well
John you know he was looking out for
different career options and he finally
landed a plum job in an insurance
company okay
the next one here it says to go
pear-shaped alright so another fruit
here a pear
what's a pear it it somewhat resembles
an apple it's mostly slightly light
green in color and it's really long
gated in shape but to go pear shape
it means to be unsuccessful in something
or to fail in something all right let me
write that down it means to be
unsuccessful or to fail at something so
let's take an example now supposing you
had planned to go for a movie with your
friends and you've been planning for a
couple of days you've bought the tickets
and everything was going pretty well but
suddenly two of your friends fell sick
so what happened to your movie plans
then well they went pear-shaped so in a
sentence you could say we had planned a
movie out with our friends on Saturday
however all our plans went pear-shaped
when two of our friends fell sick all
have changed yours I've used the

alright remember that means to be

very beautiful or really helpful or
maybe both just like me I'm just fooling
around so a page is someone who is

helpful beautiful just a nice person all
right
so if you know someone like that you
could say that well Sam he's really a
he always helps us with any work
that we have okay next one here a lemon
we all know what's a lemon it's a Sur
kind of a tangy fruit all right but a
lemon here means a product or something
that does not work okay so let's see a
product that does not work that's so bad
so maybe you really wanted to buy a car
all right
and you managed your finances you went
into a showroom and you purchased a
brand-new car obviously you're very
excited and your car runs fine for the
first week or so suddenly in the second
week you notice some issues with the car
and when you take it to a garage you
realize that there are really some major
problems with the car that you have been
sold so that car would then become a
lemon a product that does not work so in
a sentence you could say well I'm so
upset with the car dealer because he
sold me my lemon all right the next one
here it says apples and oranges these
are very common fruits I'm sure you
would know what apples and oranges are
all right but apples and oranges this
phrase of this idiom means someone or
some people who are absolutely different
from each other okay so it's used to
describe people who are totally
different from each other
so maybe you know twins who are Peter
and Michael all right and these are two
boys who are twins however they are
absolutely different from each other
okay
their personalities their habits their
choices everything if you want to
describe a talk about these two guys in

and Michael are twins
they are like apples and oranges
completely totally different from each
other
next one here it says not give a fig you

interested in politics
next one here and this is quite

let's write that down an opportunity you

right so possibly I could say in a
sentence
well that promotion that you just lost
it was your last bite at the cherry
means it was your last opportunity to
achieve something and then we have my
favorite one okay it says to go bananas
what does it mean to go bananas it means
to go completely crazy to get annoyed to
get angry go bananas okay to go crazy or
to get angry so in a sentence I could
say whenever I lose a game I go bananas
which means I go crazy I get really
annoyed okay and then finally we have
the last one here which has my favorite
fruit the Apple in it again it says
apple of your eye now apple of your eye
means is used when you want to talk

absolutely adore and admire and you
really like them okay
apple of your eye is someone you are

Shania I really admire her she is the
